attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is Known as a Multi-cultural country and famed for its tolerance. Our Government preaches that we must integrate more with our foreign neighbours. How can we integrate when the government is allowing the building of more and more faith schools . If you segregate the child in the school years they certainly wont intergrate when they have left.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban Faith Schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18429
